H0.text: In which film was the song White Christmas first sung. Holiday Inn

H1.text: In which film was the song White Christmas first sung. Meet Me in St. Louis

H2.text: In which film was the song White Christmas first sung. Easter Parade

H3.text: In which film was the song White Christmas first sung. Holidex

A4.text: The composer wrote twelve songs specifically for the film, the best known being 'White Christmas'.

A5.text: The film received a 1943 Academy Award for Best Original Song (Berlin's 'White Christmas').
